actions.recommendation: BP > 140/90 is hypertension. Medication & lifestyle changes manage this & lower its complications.
-ECG found changes caused by hypertension. There were also ST depressions in some areas. A repeat ECG is advised once BP is controlled.
-Lung function is much lower than expected. A repeat test is recommended with improved technique.
-Aim to keep BMI between 18.5 - 24.9 & waist-to-height ratio below 50.
-BMI at 32.1 & waist-to-height ratio at 58 are high. This can worsen conditions such as hypertension & diabetes.
-Aches & pains after exercise are normal. If your knees do not settle, further investigations should be conducted.
-Educate yourself about hypertension & insulin resistance. Improve your diet & lifestyle and commit to your follow ups.
-Seek medical help for your mental health.
